testsuite.name: Scenario: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword

testcase.name: Given command new user is selected

testcase.name: When user "user" with password "user" is created
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword

testcase.name: And command new user is selected
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword

testcase.name: And username "user" and password "user" are entered
testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword

testcase.classname: Scenario: creation fails with already taken username and valid pasword
